comments.body: Should return `nil, false, nil` for this case here?
IMO, no need. In this case, we just hint user in the log, but will still start the `RouteController`.

I don't follow and maybe I missed something. Here we never actually run the route controller go routine but we will log "Started: routecontroller", that does not seem like the right behavior to me ðŸ¤”

Parsing failed.
Yet we still pass clusterCIDR on line 126 below ?

follow the original code,
besides, If parsing failed, the `clusterCIDR` just `nil`
can also the same logic in `cmd\kube-controller-manager\app\core.go`
